official_title: A resolution to require proposed budgets to distinguish between capital expenditures and current outlays.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Senate to increase the public's general understanding of the objectives of Federal spending. Requires the budget submitted by the President for each fiscal year and the Congressional Budget to distinguish proposed outlays for capital items and investment-type programs and purposes from proposed outlays for other programs and purposes.
